nodes.documentation: @title ERC20 Token contract, with detached state and designed to operate behind a proxy.
nodes.name: ExternStateToken
allowance

nodes.documentation: @notice Returns the ERC20 token balance of a given account.
nodes.name: balanceOf
setTokenState

nodes.documentation:
@dev Perform an ERC20 token transfer. Designed to be called by transfer functions possessing
the onlyProxy or optionalProxy modifiers.
nodes.name: _transfer_byProxy

nodes.documentation:
@dev Perform an ERC20 token transferFrom. Designed to be called by transferFrom functions
possessing the optionalProxy or optionalProxy modifiers.
nodes.name: _transferFrom_byProxy

nodes.documentation: @notice Approves spender to transfer on the message sender's behalf.
nodes.name: approve
